description: The original Kor Strata™ Hoody was a minimalist design for any kind of undertaking—that vision stands true today but in an even more progressive silhouette. It still takes the sting out of monster and mundane missions alike and is packed with Primaloft® Gold Active insulation—and now with an added turtleneck and Polartec® Power Stretch® finish at the sleeves and collar, it can go and do more than ever before.
name: Mountain Hardwear Kor Strata Pullover Hoody - Mens
